/usr/bin/c++   -ffunction-sections -fdata-sections -fPIC -m64 -O3 -DNDEBUG  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/spirv-remap.dir/spirv-remap.cpp.o  -o spirv-remap ../glslang/libglslang.a ../SPIRV/libSPIRV.a libglslang-default-resource-limits.a ../SPIRV/libSPVRemapper.a -lpthread ../glslang/libglslang.a ../OGLCompilersDLL/libOGLCompiler.a ../glslang/OSDependent/Unix/libOSDependent.a -pthread ../hlsl/libHLSL.a ../../spirv-tools/source/opt/libSPIRV-Tools-opt.a ../../spirv-tools/source/libSPIRV-Tools.a -lrt
